messages.message:
After Converse responds to a prompt, it sometimes continues to show its “hang on, I’m thinking” spinner for a while before it lets you type in your next prompt.
On slow environments (like preprod, sometimes) it can take 60 seconds or more before the spinner goes away and Converse is ready for more input.
Can this delay be shortened?
If not, should we explain to users (either in the GUI or in the docs) what it’s doing during this time, to avoid confusion/frustration?
